column4: Quick Question - On XP, if I go start - run - \\otherxpcomputernamehere I can see that computers shared documents. How can I do this from within Ubuntu? How can I view an XP computers shared documents on my network?
I have samba installed, but that doesn't answer my question.
My question is how do I view shared documents on an XP machine. What do I do to view them. Where do I go. Network? Connect to server?
you'll probably have to set up samba to view them
